Package me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.inventory

Class SignGUI

java.lang.Object
me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.inventory.SignGUI
public abstract class SignGUI extends Object
Opens a SIGN that can be used as input.

  • Constructor Details

    • SignGUI

      public SignGUI(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, @Nullable String prompt)
      Creates a new SignGUI.
      Parameters:
      player - - Player for this gui to.
      prompt - - Prompt of the sign. Input and prompt is separated by line of '^' characters. Prompt cannot be longer than 28 characters or it will be appended by '...'

    • SignGUI

      public SignGUI(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, @Nonnull String... prompt)
      Creates a new SignGUI.
      Parameters:
      player - - Player to
      prompt - - Up to 4 lines of prompt text. This method will NOT include '^' character.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if prompt lines are longer than 4 lines.
